duplicateCapturesDescription: If the same location was captured more than once on the same day, only the most recent data is retained.
rpciGradesDescription: You can set the grades/scores to be used for rPCI analysis below as desired.
updatedGradingSystemNotice: The updated grading system will apply to all analyses going forward.

rpci_analyze.step01: We are about to perform the rPCI analysis
rpci_analyze.step02: for the period currently selected on the screen. Do you want to proceed?
rpci_analyze.step03: If you’d like to change the analysis period, click [Cancel]
rpci_analyze.step04: to return to the previous screen and adjust the map’s query period.
rpci_analyze.step05: Please enter the name for the new session to be created.
rpci_analyze.step06: Please select the road for rPCI analysis.
rpci_analyze.popup01_content: rPCI analysis has started. You can monitor its progress in the [Rapid-PCI] menu.
rpci_analyze.popup02_content: Are you sure you want to cancel the rPCI analysis? This action cannot be undone.
rpci_analyze.popup03_content: Do you want to change the rPCI analysis session name?
rpci_analyze.popup04_content: Do you want to cancel the rPCI analysis session name change?
rpci_analyze.popup05_content: Do you want to apply the entered name for the rPCI analysis session?
rpci_analyze.popup06_content: Would you like to save the report for the currently selected session as a PDF file?
rpci_analyze.popup07_content: Would you like to save the current settings?
